verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after זָקֵ֖ן <WH2204> was old שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> And it came to pass when Samuel וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> that he made אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> his sons שֹׁפְטִ֖ים <WH8199> judges לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become שֶׁם־ <WH8034> Now the name בְּנ֤וֹ <WH1121> afflicted הַבְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> of his firstborn יוֹאֵ֔ל <WH3100> was Joel וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name מִשְׁנֵ֖הוּ <WH4932> of his second אֲבִיָּ֑ה <WH29> Abiah שֹׁפְטִ֖ים <WH8199> [they were] judges בִּבְאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> in Beersheba

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הָלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> walked בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> And his sons [בְּדַרְכֹו כ] (בִּדְרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> along ק) וַיִּטּ֖וּ <WH5186> but turned aside אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הַבָּ֑צַע <WH1215> lucre וַיִּ֨קְחוּ־ <WH3947> and took שֹׁ֔חַד <WH7810> bribes וַיַּטּ֖וּ <WH5186> and perverted מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment פ

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֔וּ <WH6908> gathered themselves together כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> Then all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> to Samuel הָרָמָֽתָה׃ <WH7414> unto Ramah

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you זָקַ֔נְתָּ <WH2204> unto him Behold thou art old וּבָנֶ֕יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> walk בִּדְרָכֶ֑יךָ <WH1870> not in thy ways עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שִֽׂימָה־ <WH7760> now make לָּ֥נוּ מֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> us a king לְשָׁפְטֵ֖נוּ <WH8199> to judge כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> us like all the nations

וַיֵּ֤רַע <WH7489> was displeasing הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> But the thing בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> the sight שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they אָמְר֔וּ <WH559> when they said תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Give לָּ֥נוּ מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> us a king לְשָׁפְטֵ֑נוּ <WH8199> to judge וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> prayed שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> us And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> unto Samuel שְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> Hearken בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they יֹאמְר֖וּ <WH559> in all that they say אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not אֹֽתְךָ֙ <WH853> מָאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> unto thee for they have not rejected כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֹתִ֥י <WH853> מָאֲס֖וּ <WH3988> thee but they have rejected מִמְּלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> me that I should not reign עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over

כְּכָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּעֲשִׂ֣ים <WH4639> According to all the works אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> which they have done מִיּוֹם֩ <WH3117> since the day הַעֲלֹתִ֨י <WH5927> that I brought them up אֹתָ֤ם <WH853> מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> out of Egypt וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> even unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this וַיַּ֣עַזְבֻ֔נִי <WH5800> wherewith they have forsaken וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> me and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they עֹשִׂ֖ים <WH6213> so do גַּם־ <WH1571> also לָֽךְ׃

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Now therefore hearken בְּקוֹלָ֑ם <WH6963> unto their voice אַ֗ךְ <WH389> howbeit כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָעֵ֤ד <WH5749> yet protest תָּעִיד֙ <WH5749> solemnly בָּהֶ֔ם וְהִגַּדְתָּ֣ <WH5046> unto them and shew לָהֶ֔ם מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> them the manner הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> that shall reign עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> told שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> all the words יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֕ם <WH5971> unto the people הַשֹּׁאֲלִ֥ים <WH7592> that asked מֵאִתּ֖וֹ <WH853> מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of him a king ס

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said זֶ֗ה <WH2088> This יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> This will be the manner הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> that shall reign עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1121> your sons יִקָּ֗ח <WH3947> over you He will take וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> and appoint לוֹ֙ בְּמֶרְכַּבְתּ֣וֹ <WH4818> [them] for himself for his chariots וּבְפָרָשָׁ֔יו <WH6571> and [to be] his horsemen וְרָצ֖וּ <WH7323> and [some] shall run לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מֶרְכַּבְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4818> his chariots

וְלָשׂ֣וּם <WH7760> And he will appoint ל֔וֹ שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> him captains אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <WH2572> over fifties וְלַחֲרֹ֤שׁ <WH2790> and [will set them] to ear חֲרִישׁוֹ֙ <WH2758> his ground וְלִקְצֹ֣ר <WH7114> and to reap קְצִיר֔וֹ <WH7105> his harvest וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> and to make כְּלֵֽי־ <WH3627> his instruments מִלְחַמְתּ֖וֹ <WH4421> of war וּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> and instruments רִכְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7393> of his chariots

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1323> your daughters יִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> And he will take לְרַקָּח֥וֹת <WH7548> [to be] confectionaries וּלְטַבָּח֖וֹת <WH2879> and [to be] cooks וּלְאֹפֽוֹת׃ <WH644> and [to be] bakers

וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׂ֠דֽוֹתֵיכֶם <WH7704> your fields וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּרְמֵיכֶ֧ם <WH3754> and your vineyards וְזֵיתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH2132> and your oliveyards הַטּוֹבִ֖ים <WH2896> [even] the best יִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> And he will take וְנָתַ֖ן <WH5414> [of them] and give לַעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> [them] to his servants

וְזַרְעֵיכֶ֥ם <WH2233> of your seed וְכַרְמֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3754> and of your vineyards יַעְשֹׂ֑ר <WH6237> And he will take the tenth וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> and give לְסָרִיסָ֖יו <WH5631> to his officers וְלַעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> and to his servants

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֵיכֶם֩ <WH5650> your menservants וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> שִׁפְח֨וֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH8198> and your maidservants וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּחוּרֵיכֶ֧ם <WH970> young men הַטּוֹבִ֛ים <WH2896> and your goodliest וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמוֹרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2543> and your asses יִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> And he will take וְעָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and put לִמְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4399> [them] to his work
צֹאנְכֶ֖ם <WH6629> of your sheep יַעְשֹׂ֑ר <WH6237> He will take the tenth וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you תִּֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> will become ל֥וֹ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> and ye shall be his servants

וּזְעַקְתֶּם֙ <WH2199> And ye shall cry out בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> because מַלְכְּכֶ֔ם <WH4428> of your king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH977> which ye shall have chosen לָכֶ֑ם וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַעֲנֶ֧ה <WH6030> will not hear יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> you and the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> you in that day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <WH3985> refused הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> Nevertheless the people לִשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> to obey בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> of Samuel וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and they said לֹּ֔א <WH3808> No כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Nay but we will have a king יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> over

וְהָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> become גַם־ <WH1571> also אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> That we also may be like all the nations וּשְׁפָטָ֤נוּ <WH8199> may judge מַלְכֵּ֙נוּ֙ <WH4428> and that our king וְיָצָ֣א <WH3318> us and go out לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> before וְנִלְחַ֖ם <WH3898> us and fight אֶת־ <WH853> מִלְחֲמֹתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH4421> our battles

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> all the words הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וַֽיְדַבְּרֵ֖ם <WH1696> and he rehearsed בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> them in the ears יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> to Samuel שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hearken בְּקוֹלָ֔ם <WH6963> unto their voice וְהִמְלַכְתָּ֥ <WH4427> and make לָהֶ֖ם מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> them a king וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> ye every man יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> Go אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> unto his city פ
